experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implementing data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
reference_context: Responsibilities included transforming raw data into inferred values, automated testing, optimizing system scalability, troubleshooting failures using CloudWatch logs, and automating DevOps processes.
experiences.reasoning: This experience indicates expertise in software development, DevOps, and data processing within the renewable energy sector.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms. Engineered 6 GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines with numerous tasks and integrated them with backend scripts to process data from Pre-staging to end-user report generation stage. Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing 4 UI Forms and 8 PL/SQL scripts to process over 300k customer records. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation to automate manual tasks.
reference_context: Focus on implementing fintech solutions, engineering ETL pipelines, enhancing UI, and automating data processes.
experiences.reasoning: Demonstrates capability in software engineering, particularly in fintech and data manipulation using PL/SQL and Oracle technologies.

experiences.title: Graduate Services Assistant
experiences.company: Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering at Arizona State University
experiences.description: Grader for CSE 536 Advanced Operating Systems course. Prepared and reviewed coursework, assisted students during office hours, and graded assignments.
reference_context: Engagement in academic support by grading and assisting students in advanced operating systems courses.
experiences.reasoning: Illustrates experience in academia and education, supporting roles in teaching advanced technical subjects.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshooted bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
reference_context: Developed software for embedded systems, focusing on sensor data measurement and system optimization.
experiences.reasoning: Experience demonstrates capability in embedded systems development and real-time data handling.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Designed custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with accuracy of 95% using linear regression.
reference_context: Focused on developing a Python library for data mining and implementing mathematical models.
experiences.reasoning: Reflects strong analytical skills and proficiency in Python, particularly in data processing and algorithm development.
